User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (Firebase Auth UID).

signupDate.description: The time the user signed up.

InterviewSession.title: InterviewSession
InterviewSession.description: Represents a single interview session for a user.

userId.description: Reference to the User who took this interview.

jobTitle.description: The job title for which the interview was taken.

startTime.description: Timestamp for the start of the interview session.

endTime.description: Timestamp for the end of the interview session.

overallScore.description: Overall performance score for the interview session.

feedbackReport.description: The detailed feedback report in Markdown format.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information. The document ID is the Firebase Auth UID.

/users/{userId}/interviewSessions/{sessi.description: Stores individual interview session reports for each user.
